name: Harpoon Hero
description:
Engage in air born battles and crush your enemies to dust!

This is a very early prototype but I was looking to get some feedback, comment your thoughts if you played it! Updates are coming soon!

Controls: 

WASD to move

E to shoot the harpoon/ pull once locked

Q to release the harpoon from a wall

Details:

The spinning enemies must be thrown against a wall to kill, otherwise they´ll cling to the harpoon and keep dealing you damage.

The white dial is the gun´s pressure, which you need in order to shoot.
